preqs: Twelve credit points of second-year Journalism units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 12 (I/W) credit points at levels {2} from units owned by {50099151}

description: Advanced writing and interviewing helps students refine their interviewing, researching and writing skills. The course will emphasise accuracy and critical-thinking skills. Whatever your aspirations, if you want your journalism to be a compelling read to a wider audience, this unit can arm you with the storytelling tools you need.
